sentences.en: The only sound was the crackle of breaking ice.

sentences.en: Varnish applied over wet paint is likely to crackle.

sentences.en: We can hear the crackle of the wood on the fire in the next room.

sentences.en: We heard the rapid crackle of automatic gunfire.

words.tran_cn: 猪油渣；脆皮；连续的爆裂声
